original_title: Mischief: JDM Mischief - Babes Drifting Racing
overview: JDM Mischief is the latest series from the top-selling Mischief brand. You will see the best JDM sports and performance cars from the U.S.A. and Japan.  Slide along with drifters at the U.S. Drift Nationals and the SEMA show. Join us for illegal street canyon racing, or touge, and finally we take you for a ride in one of the fastest EVO’s ever. JDM Mischief is girls, cars, and cat fighting – What more could you ask for!
title: Mischief: JDM Mischief - Babes Drifting Racing
